system.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Water- or Fire-Type attack.

Effect: The user's SPD Stages are increased by +6 for 5 activations.

Note: Effect has to be manually dragged onto the actor at this time.

@embed[Compendium.ptr2e.core-effects.Item.MK3yA3vNby5Z3Yya.ActiveEffect.Oje9HVS8FwjF5cvR]
